  <p style="font-family:'CG Times';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

 </tr>

 <tr>

  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:50.0%;">

  <p style="font-family:'CG Times';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">/s/ Leonard E. Schnitzer</font></font></i></p>

  </td>

  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:6.82%;">

  <p style="font-family:'CG Times';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="43%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:43.18%;">

  <p style="font-family:'CG Times';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">/s/ Gayle S. Romain</font></font></i></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

 <tr>

  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="border:none;padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:50.0%;">

  <h3 align="left" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:normal;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Leonard E. Schnitzer, as Trustee</font></font></h3>

  </td>

  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:6.82%;">

  <h3 align="left" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:normal;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;">&nbsp;</h3>

  </td>

  <td width="43%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:43.18%;">

  <h3 align="left" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:normal;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Gayle S. Romain, as Trustee</font></font></h3>

  </td>

 </tr>

 <tr>

  <td width="50%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:50.0%;">

<head>



<title>Prepared by MERRILL CORPORATION</title>



</head>



<body>



<div>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit 10.24</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE

RETIREMENT BONUS PLAN</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">FOR SCHNITZER STEEL

INDUSTRIES, INC.</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">AND AFFILIATED EMPLOYERS</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Amended and Restated</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Effective January 1, 2000</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">INTRODUCTION</font></font></u></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The principal objective of the Supplemental Executive Retirement Bonus

Plan is to ensure the payment of a competitive level of retirement income in

order to attract, retain, and motivate selected executives.&#160; The Plan is designed to provide a benefit

which, when added to other retirement income of the executive, will meet the

objective described above.&#160; Eligibility

for participation in the Plan shall be limited to executives selected by the

Board of Directors of the participating Employer.&#160; Each Employer shall be individually and solely responsible for

benefits accrued under this Plan by its executives who are Participants in this

Plan.</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 1</font></font></u></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">DEFINITIONS</font></font></u></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Accrued Benefit</u> with respect

to a Participant, as of any calculation date, means an annual pension amount

equal to the excess, if any, of the Participant&#146;s Target Benefit over the sum

of the Qualified Plan Benefit Offset and the Social Security Benefit Offset,

all determined as of the calculation date, and expressed as annual pension

amounts.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Actuarial Equivalent</u>, as of

any calculation date, means equal in present value based on an interest rate

assumption equal to the 30-year U.S. TCM rate (as published in the Federal

Reserve Statistical Bulletin) for the month of December preceding the year of

the calculation date and the 1993 Group Annuity Unisex Mortality Table.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Administrative Committee</u> means

the Administrative Committee appointed by the Board which has been given

authority by the Board to administer this Plan.</font></font></p>



<font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1 -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

</font></font>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Adjusted Bonus</u>

means the lesser of bonus paid, or 25% of salary during the period for which

the bonus was earned.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Board</u> shall mean the Board of

Directors of Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Change in Control</u>. A change in

control shall occur if:</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Any &#147;person&#148; or &#147;group&#148; (within the meaning of Section 13(d) and

14(d) (2) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#147;Act&#148;))

becomes the &#147;beneficial owner&#148; (as defined in the Rule 13-d under the Act) of

more than 20 percent of the then outstanding voting stock or partnership

interests of the Employer, or in the case of a limited partnership, in the

outstanding voting stock of the General Partner of the Employer, otherwise than

through a transaction arranged by, or consummated with the prior approval of,

the Board of Directors of the Employer, or in the case of a limited partnership,

the Board of Directors of the General Partner (the Employer, Board); or</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)&#160;&#160;&#160; During any period of two consecutive years, individuals who at

the beginning of such period constitute the Employer Board (and any new

director whose election by the Employer Board or whose nomination for election

by the stockholders of the Employer was approved by a vote of at least

two-thirds of the directors then still in office who either were directors at

the beginning of such period or whose election or nomination for election was

previously so approved) cease for any reason to constitute a majority thereof.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.7&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Company </u>shall mean Schnitzer

Steel Industries, Inc. or successors and any participating affiliated company

as determined by the Board.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.8&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Credited Service</u> as of a

calculation date shall mean the completed years and months of service as of

such date not interrupted by a break in employment, other than a leave of

absence approved in advance by the board of directors of the participating

Employer.&#160; A participant cannot earn

more than one year of Credited Service within a 12-month period. Credited

Service for employment prior to a Participant&#146;s Entry Date shall be

proportionately reduced to the extent that the ratio of his Credited Service

after Entry Date divided by the number of years between Entry Date and His

Normal Retirement Date is less than one. The reduction described in the

preceding sentence shall not apply however in the case of a Participant whose

termination is on account of his own death.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.9&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Earnings</u> shall mean all

employee cash compensation from an Employer, including salary and Adjusted

Bonus (before any voluntary reductions).&#160;

Adjusted Bonus shall be considered Earnings in the year earned.&#160; Adjusted bonuses payable for fiscal years

ending within a calendar year shall be considered to be earned ratably over the

12 months of that calendar year.</font></font></p>



<font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1 -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

</font></font>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.10&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Employer </u>shall mean the Company,

any affiliated company, and any non-affiliated company that adopts this Plan by

designating an Employee as a Participant pursuant to Paragraph 1.13.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.11&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Entry Date</u> shall mean the date

set forth in The Board of Directors action designating an employee as a

Participant in accordance with Paragraph 1.13.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.12&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Final Average Earnings</u> shall

mean the average of the five highest-paid consecutive calendar years in

Earnings.&#160; In the case of a late

retirement benefit under Paragraph 2.6 (b), this calculation shall not include

calendar years for which the Board of Directors has not granted its approval.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.13&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Normal Retirement Date</u> means the

first day of the month coinciding with or next following a Participant&#146;s 60<sup>th</sup>

birthday.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.14&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Participant </u>means an employee of

an Employer designated as a Participant by the Board of Directors of an

Employer.&#160; An employee shall become a

Participant in the Plan as of the date he or she is individually selected by

that Board of Directors.&#160; A list of the

designated employees as of Janury 1, 2000 is shown in Appendix I.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.15&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Plan</u> means the Supplemental

Executive Retirement Bonus Plan for Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc. and

Affiliated Employers.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.16&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Plan Year</u> shall mean the

calendar year.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.17&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Qualified Plans</u> shall mean the

Pension Retirement Plan, the Supplemental Retirement Plan, and the Salary

Deferral Retirement Plan for Employees of Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc. and

Affiliated Employers; the Cascade Steel Rolling Mills, Inc.&#160; Employees Retirement Plan; the Salary

Deferral Plan for Cascade Steel Rolling Mills, Inc. and Affiliated Employers,

and any other plan of deferred compensation maintained by an Employer in

accordance with Section 401(a) of the Internal Revenue Code.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.18&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Qualified Plan Benefit Offset</u>

with respect to a Participant as of any date means the annual annuity benefit

payable in monthly installments and commencing at his Normal Retirement Date

(or age at calculation date if greater) that is actuarially equivalent to the

value of all employer-provided benefits (including matching contributions)

accrued by such Participant under the Qualified Plans. Benefits attributable to

an employee&#146;s after-tax or 401(k) contributions shall not be included as part

of the Qualified Plan Benefit Offset.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.19&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Social Security Benefit Offset</u>

with respect to a Participant as of any calculation date means the annual

projected Social Security Benefit payable at age 65 (or age at calculation date

if greater) assuming maximum Social Security covered wages in&#160; prior years and no Social Security covered

wages in future years.</font></font></p>



<font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1 -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

</font></font>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.20&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Target Benefit</u>

with respect to a Participant as of any calculation date shall mean the lesser

of a) and b) below:</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 2.6% of Final Average Earnings multiplied by the Participant&#146;s

years of Total Credited Service, up to a maximum of 65% of Final Average

Earnings.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .75in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)&#160;&#160;&#160; The Adjusted SERBP Cap, which is calculated as a dollar amount multiplied

by a fraction, the numerator of which is the Participants Credited Service and

the denominator of which is the greater of the numerator or 25 years. The

dollar amount for 1994 is $159,194. The dollar amount for any year after 1994

shall be equal to $159,194&#160; multiplied

by ratio of the Code Section 401(a)(17) limit for that year over the Code

Section 401(a)(17) limit for 1994.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.21&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Trust</u> shall mean the trust

established by the Company to hold and invest contributions made under the Plan

and from which the Plan&#146;s benefits will be distributed.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.22&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The masculine gender, where appearing

in the Plan, will be deemed to include the feminine gender, and the singular

may include the plural, unless the context clearly indicates the contrary.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 2</font></font></u></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">ELIGIBILITY FOR AND

AMOUNT OF BENEFITS</font></font></u></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Normal Retirement</u>.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; A Participant who terminates employment from all

Employers on his Normal Retirement Date is eligible to receive a normal

retirement benefit..</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; A Participant&#146;s normal retirement benefit is equal to his

Accrued Benefit determined at Normal Retirement Date.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Early Retirement</u>.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; A Participant who terminates employment from all

Employers before his Normal Retirement Date but after attaining age 55 and

after having completed at least 10 years of Credited Service is eligible to

receive an early retirement benefit.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; A Participant&#146;s early retirement benefit is equal to his

Accrued Benefit determined at Early Retirement Date,&#160; reduced by 1/3 of one percent for each month by which the first

payment precedes his Normal Retirement Date.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, if the Participant

retires in conjunction with a Change in Control, the early retirement benefit

will equal the projected Accrued Benefit assuming continued employment to his

Normal Retirement Date and Final Average Earnings equal to the greater of his

Final Average Earnings and annualized earnings at termination.&#160; Annualized earnings shall mean the annual

rate of base pay plus the most recently paid Adjusted Bonus.&#160; The Social Security Benefit Offset described

in Article I will be calculated assuming payment at age 65 and zero earnings

from after his Normal Retirement Date.&#160;

The first benefit payment is paid on the first of the month following early

retirement.</font></font></p>



<font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1 -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

</font></font>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;">&nbsp;</p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Late Retirement Benefit</u>.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; A Participant who terminates employment with all

Employers after his Normal Retirement Date is eligible for a Late Retirement

Benefit.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Late Retirement Benefit is calculated as the sum of:</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The

Participant&#146;s Normal Retirement Benefit; plus,</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The increase, if any, of the

Participant&#146;s Accrued Benefit for employment, with Board approval, after Normal

Retirement Date.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Vested Termination Benefit</u>.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; A Vested Termination Benefit is payable to a Participant

who terminates employment after completion of five years of Credited Service

after his Entry Date but before becoming eligible for early or normal

retirement.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Vested Termination Benefit is an amount equal to the

Accrued Benefit calculated as of date of termination of employment, and payable

commencing at his Normal Retirement Date. A Participant may elect to begin

receiving his Vested Termination Benefit before reaching his Normal Retirement

Date provided he has attained age 55 and has completed 10 years of service.&#160; In this case, his Vested Termination Benefit

shall be reduced by 1/3 of one percent for each month by which the first

payment precedes his Normal Retirement Date.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Death Benefit</u>.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; A Death Benefit is payable to the surviving spouse of a

Participant who dies before termination of employment but after meeting the

applicable age and service requirements for a retirement benefit under the

preceding sections of this Article.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The spouse death benefit shall be equal to 50% of the

benefit that would have been paid to the Participant had he terminated

employment immediately prior to date and elected to begin receiving his

retirement benefits at the earliest possible date determined under the

preceding sections of this Article, adjusted to include reflect all Credited Service

prior to Entry Date in accordance with Section 1.8.. If the surviving spouse is

more than ten years younger than the Participant, the spouse death benefit will

be reduced &#189; of 1% for each full month the surviving spouse is more than ten

years younger than the Participant.</font></font></p>



<font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1 -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

</font></font>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Forms of Benefit Payment</u>.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The benefit determined under this

Plan will be payable as a straight life annuity calculated as of the date of

retirement, with no further adjustment for subsequent inflation.&#160; If the Participant is married, the benefit

will be in the form of an actuarially reduced 50% contingent annuity with his

spouse as contingent annuitant.&#160; The

Participant may also elect to receive benefits payable on an actuarial

equivalent basis in a form other than the &#147;normal form&#148; of annuity stated

above, as approved by the Administrative Committee, but in no case shall the

Administrative Committee approve payment of benefits as a lump sum.&#160; If the Participant is married, election of

payment form other than the 50% contingent annuity shall require the spouses

written consent either notarized or witnessed by a plan representative.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; A participant shall be provided with a written

explanation of the normal form of benefits no earlier than 90 days and no later

than 30 days before the annuity is to commence.&#160; The explanation shall include:</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the terms and conditions of the

normal form of benefits</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the Participant&#146;s right to waive the

normal form and the effect of such waiver, and</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the spouse&#146;s rights as specified in

(a) above.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Administrative Committee shall have all powers

necessary to supervise the administration of the Plan and to control its

operation in accordance with its terms, including, but not by way of

limitation, the following:</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; to establish rules from time to time

for the performance of its functions and the administration of the Plan,

provided that such rules shall not be inconsistent with the Plan, and the

Trust.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; to interpret the provisions of the

Plan and to determine any question arising under the Plan, or in connection

with the administration or operation thereof.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; to compute the amount of retirement

benefit payable under the Plan to any person.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; to authorize and direct all

disbursements pursuant to the Plan.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; to employ and engage such persons,

counsel (who may be counsel for an Employer) and agents and to obtain such

administrative, clerical, legal, auditing, consulting, and actuarial services

as it may deem necessary or appropriate in carrying out the provisions of the

Plan.</font></font></p>



<font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1 -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

</font></font>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;">&nbsp;</p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.7&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The decision of the Administrative

Committee and any action taken by it with respect to the Plan shall be

conclusive and binding upon any and all Participants and former Participants,

and their beneficiaries, heirs, distributees, executors, administrators and

assigns, and upon all other persons whomsoever.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.8&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Service with Multiple Employers.</u>&#160; A Participant who has Credited Service with

more than one Employer shall receive a benefit based on all Credited Service

and Earnings with the Employers.&#160; The

obligation to pay such benefit shall be allocated among the Employers in

proportion to the Participant&#146;s Credited Service with each.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.9&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Non-competition Agreement.</u>&#160; As an additional requirement before becoming

eligible to receive a Normal, Early or Late Retirement Benefit, a Participant

shall execute a non-competition agreement with the Participant&#146;s Employer.&#160; As a continuing condition for payment of the

benefits under the Plan, the Participant shall not use, directly or indirectly,

the knowledge, skills, contacts or experience he gained while employed by the

employer (or any affiliated entity) after terminating his employment, in

violation of the terms of the non-competition agreement.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Employer shall determine the

terms of the non-competition agreement at the time the Participant terminates

employment.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The term of the non-competition agreement shall be five

years.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The scope of activities and geographic area covered by

the non-competition agreement shall reflect (but not be limited to) the

Participant&#146;s current and previous job descriptions with the Employer, as well

as duties the Participant performs or performed for other entities under any

shared services agreements to which the Employer is or was a party.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The non-competition agreement shall provide that in case

the Participant breaches the limitations of the agreement, the Employer shall

cease paying benefits otherwise payable to the Participant or any contingent

annuitant under the Plan.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.10&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Coordination with LTD Plan</u>.

Notwithstanding the foregoing, if&#160;

Participant terminates his or her employment with an Employer under

circumstances which qualify the Participant for benefits under a long-term

disability plan maintained by the Employer (the &#147;LTD Benefits&#148;); and benefits

paid to the Participant under this Plan would reduce the LTD Benefits he or she

would otherwise receive (the &#147;Potential LTD Reduction&#148;); then to the extent and

for the duration of the Potential LTD Reduction, such Participant&#146;s benefits

calculated under the applicable provisions of this Plan shall be reduced, but

not below zero, by an amount equal to the Potential LTD Reduction.</font></font></p>



<font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1 -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

</font></font>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;">&nbsp;</p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 3</font></font></u></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">MISCELLANEOUS</font></font></u></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Amendment and Plan Termination.</u>&#160; The Board may, at its sole discretion,

terminate, suspend, or amend this Plan at any time or from time to time, in

whole or in part, with respect to any or all Employers, and benefits under this

Plan will cease to accrue in the event of such termination or suspension.&#160; If the Plan is terminated, suspended, or

amended to reduce benefits, all Participants or Beneficiaries receiving

benefits and all other Participants will be entitled to their benefits accrued

under the Plan.&#160; In such event, the

Board of Directors of each Participant&#146;s Employer will, at its sole discretion,

elect any one or more, or a combination, of the following alternatives to

satisfy the Employer&#146;s obligations to Participants or Beneficiaries receiving

benefits.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Purchase and distribute insurance

company annuities</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Continue to operate the Plan as to

Accrued Benefits pursuant to the Plan provisions in effect at the date of Plan

termination or amendment.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Not an Employment Agreement.</u>&#160; Nothing contained herein will confer upon

any Participant the right to be retained in the service of the Company, nor

will it interfere with the right of the Company to discharge or otherwise deal

with any Participant without regard to the existence of this Plan.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Assignment of Benefits.</u>&#160; A Participant may not, either voluntarily or

involuntarily, assign, anticipate, alienate, commute, pledge, or encumber any

benefits to which he is or may become entitled to under the Plan, nor may the

same be subject to attachment or garnishment by any creditor of a Participant.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Payments to Trust.</u>&#160; Contributions under the Plan shall be paid

by the Company directly to the trustee of the Trust as soon as practicable.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Unfunded Plan.</u>&#160; Except as provided in the Trust, the

following shall apply:</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All contributions made as a result of

the terms of the Plan shall continue for all purposes to be a part of the

general funds of the Company.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; To the extent that any person

acquires a right to receive payments from the Plan, such right shall be no

greater than the right of any unsecured general <br>

Creditor of the Company.</font></font></p>



<font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1 -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

</font></font>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>State Law.</u>&#160; The provisions of the Plan and all rights

created thereunder shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the

laws of the State of Oregon.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc.

adopted this amended and restated Plan, effective January 1, 2000.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

  </td>

<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Appendix I</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Participating Employees as of January 1, 2000</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Kramer, Loren</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Lewis, Ken</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Novack, Ken</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Philip, Bob</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Rosen, Barry</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Schnitzer, Dori</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Schnitzer, Gary</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Shapiro, Philip</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



</div>

<body>



<div>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit 10.25</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Amendment to the</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE

RETIREMENT BONUS PLAN</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">FOR SCHNITZER STEEL

INDUSTRIES, INC.</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">AND AFFILIATED EMPLOYERS</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc. (hereinafter referred to the

Employer) did previously adopt the Supplemental Executive Retirement Bonus Plan

for Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc. and Affiliated Employers (the &#147;Plan&#148;);

and,</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the Employer reserved the right to amend said Plan under

Section 3.1; and the Plan was last amended and restated in its entirety

effective as of January 1, 2000;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, a further amendment is now deemed desirable in order to

clarify Employer intent with regard to interpreting a part of the Plan&#146;s

benefit formula that has been made ambiguous with the enactment of Economic

Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 (EGTRRA) and the resultant

change in Code Section 401(a)(17);</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE,&#160; the last

sentence of Section 1.20(b) is amended to read as follows:</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt .5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#160;&#147;The dollar amount for any year after 2001

shall be equal to $159,194 multiplied by ratio of the Code Section 401(a)(17)

limit for that year (as amended by EGTRRA) over the Code Section 401(a)(17)

limit for 1994.</font></font></i></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Amendment shall not apply to any participant whose employment with

the Employer terminated before January 1, 2002.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc.

adopted this amended and restated Plan, effective January 1, 2002.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.27
<SEQUENCE>6
<FILENAME>j2497_ex10d27.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.27
<TEXT>
<html>



<head>



<title>Prepared by MERRILL CORPORATION</title>



</head>



<body>



<div>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit 10.27</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Schnitzer Steel

Industries. Inc.</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">ECONOMIC VALUE ADDED

(&#147;EVA&#148;) Bonus Plan</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Effective Date: September

1, 2000</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following are the

terms of the Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc. (&#147;The Company&#148; or &#147;Schnitzer

Steel&#148;) EVA (Economic Value Added) Bonus Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;) for the eligible

employees of the Company and its wholly-owned subsidiaries (collectively, the

&#147;Employees&#148; or &#147;Participants&#148;).&#160;

References to the &#147;Company&#148; or &#147;Schnitzer Steel&#148; shall be deemed to

refer instead to a wholly owned subsidiary as the context requires for a

particular employee, employed by such subsidiary.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;" width="100%">

 <tr>

  <td width="36" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:27.0pt;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">A.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="29" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:22.05pt;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="669" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:501.75pt;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Purpose and Description

  of the Bonus Plan</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">In order to align

employee incentives with shareholder and lender interests, incentive

compensation will reward the creation of value.&#160; This Plan will tie incentive compensation or bonuses to Economic

Value Added (&#147;EVA&#148;) and, thereby, reward value creation, but also &#147;feel&#148; the

effect for declines in value. EVA is mathematically defined as net operating

profit after taxes (NOPAT), minus a Capital Charge.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">More simply put, NOPAT is

the sum of taking the sales of a business, less all of the costs and expenses

incurred to manufacture the products and generate the sales, including

taxes.&#160; Excluded from NOPAT are the costs

incurred to finance the business (e.g., interest costs on borrowings,

dividends, etc.).&#160; The Capital Charge is

one additional cost that is considered in the computation of EVA.&#160; The Capital Charge is a concept that

considers the cost or the required returns of the business&#146; lenders (e.g.,

banks, mortgage holders, etc.) and owners/shareholders.&#160; The size of the Capital Charge is primarily

based upon the amount of money invested in the business.&#160; The more inventory, customer receivables,

equipment, etc., invested in the business the higher the Capital Charge. Thus,

a Participant will be motivated to minimize as well as optimize the investment

level in the business to maximize EVA. The following is the EVA equation:</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EVA

=&#160; Net Operating Profit After Taxes

(NOPAT) &#150; Capital Charge</font></font></b></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">In addition, the Plan&#146;s

&#147;banking&#148; feature, discussed in more detail below, is designed to motivate

Employees to make decisions that are not only beneficial to the Company in the

short-term, but also have lasting benefits that will endure into the future.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;" width="100%">

 <tr>

  <td width="36" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:27.0pt;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="29" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:22.05pt;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="669" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:501.75pt;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Eligibility</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Human Resources

Department of the Company will determine eligibility. In general, an employee

of the Company and its wholly owned subsidiaries are eligible so long as they

are regular full time employees or part time employees who are scheduled to

work at least 24 hours or more per week on a regular basis and have been

employed as a regular employee for a minimum of 90 days, exclusive of the

employees subject to a collective bargaining agreement, unless such agreement

expressly provides otherwise.&#160; Newly

hired regular employees who meet the criteria for participation are eligible to

earn a prorated bonus based upon the number of days employed in the fiscal year

in which they are hired.
<!-- SEQ.=1 -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;"></font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;" width="100%">

 <tr>

  <td width="36" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:27.0pt;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="29" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:22.05pt;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="669" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:501.75pt;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bonus Calculation</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">A Participant will earn

an EVA Bonus based upon the actual EVA achieved by his or her EVA Center(s)

during the fiscal year as compared to a target (discussed in more detail

below).</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Each year, a

Participant&#146;s declared bonus will be computed as follows:</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="58%" style="border-collapse:collapse;margin-left:1.0in;width:58.04%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="18%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:18.68%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EVA</font></font></b></p>

  </td>

  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:11.24%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:4.74%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:15.94%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Target</font></font></b></p>

  </td>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:4.72%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="24%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:24.32%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:3.88%;">

  </td>

  <td width="10%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:10.08%;">

  </td>

  <td width="8%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:8.6%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">=</font></font></b></p>

  </td>

  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:11.24%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Base</font></font></b></p>

  </td>

  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:4.74%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">x</font></font></b></p>

  </td>

  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:15.94%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Bonus</font></font></b></p>

  </td>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:4.72%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">x</font></font></b></p>

  <td width="44%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:44.68%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Bonus</font></font></b></p>

  </td>
