 <tr>

  <td width="18%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:18.68%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Declaration</font></font></b></p>

  </td>

  <td width="11%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:11.24%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Salary</font></font></b></p>

  </td>

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Percentage</font></font></b></p>

  </td>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:4.72%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Multiple</font></font></b></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

 <tr height="0">

  <td width="129638" style="border:none;"></td>

  <td width="110592" style="border:none;"></td>

  <td width="144589" style="border:none;"></td>

  <td width="61030" style="border:none;"></td>

  <td width="205210" style="border:none;"></td>

  <td width="60826" style="border:none;"></td>

 </tr>

<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">To better understand how

an EVA Bonus will be declared, see the example below.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<h6 style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;page-break-after:avoid;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bonus Multiple</font></font></b></h6>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Bonus Multiple is

determined by the EVA achieved for the fiscal year compared to the EVA

objective for that year. The Bonus Multiple is mathematically determined as

follows:</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bonus Multiple =&#160; 1 + <u>Actual EVA - Target EVA</u></font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; EVA

Leverage Amount</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

(the &#147;Interval&#148;)</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Target EVA is the

required EVA needed for a Participant to earn a full Target Bonus or 1.0 times

the Target Bonus.&#160; Beginning in fiscal

years 2002 and each fiscal year after, the EVA Target for each EVA Center will be

objectively determined by starting with last year&#146;s EVA plus an improvement

factor (&#147;Expected Improvement&#148;).</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The EVA Leverage Amount

(also called the Interval) is the change in EVA over and above the Target EVA

required to double a Participant&#146;s bonus (i.e., change from a 1.0 to a 2.0

times Bonus Multiple) or the shortfall below Target EVA needed to change from a

1.0 to a 0.0 times Bonus Multiple.&#160; The

EVA Leverage Amount varies by EVA Center, based on the expected volatility of

the operating results.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Expected Improvement

and EVA Leverage Amount were determined by independent financial analysis at

the inception of the Plan and will remain unchanged for the first two full

fiscal years of the Plan, except in the event of a material change in the

Company&#146;s businesses or capital structure.&#160;

The Company&#146;s Chief Financial Officer maintains a list of the Expected

Improvements and EVA Leverage Amount for each EVA Center.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<h2 style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">EVA

Target Bonus</font></font></b></h2>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Eligible Participants

will have a Target Bonus expressed as a percentage of their base salary (the

&#147;Target Bonus Percentage&#148;).&#160; The Target

Bonus Percentage varies by level of responsibilities within the Company.&#160; Human Resources maintains the list of

Participants and their Target Bonus Percentages.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Target Bonus for each

Participant is determined by multiplying the Participant&#146;s Base Salary, as

defined below, paid during the fiscal year by the Target Bonus Percentage.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Base Salary</font></font></b></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Base Salary includes

overtime (if applicable) and paid time off (PTO) as defined by the Human

Resources Department, but excludes commissions, relocation payments, auto

allowances, severance benefits, disability benefits, other fringe benefits and

extraordinary payments.&#160; See additional

discussion on Individual Awards below.</font></font></p>



<font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1 -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

</font></font>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following is an

example of an EVA Bonus Declaration for a fictitious &#147;Participant A&#148;:</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Base Salary&#160; = $35,000</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">EVA Target Bonus = 10% of

Base Salary or $3,500</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">EVA Leverage Amount or

Interval = $2,000,000</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Target EVA for fiscal

200X = $500,000</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Actual EVA for fiscal

200X = $650,000</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bonus Multiple =</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 1 + <u>(650,000 &#150;

500,000)</u></font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 2,000,000&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;&#160; = 1.075</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="64%" style="border-collapse:collapse;margin-left:70.65pt;width:64.22%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="29%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:29.3%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">EVA Bonus Declaration</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:4.24%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">=</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="66%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:66.46%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Base Salary x Target

  Bonus Percentage x Bonus Multiple</font></font></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

 <tr>

  <td width="29%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:29.3%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:4.24%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">=</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="66%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:66.46%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">$35,000 x 10% x 1.075</font></font></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

 <tr>

  <td width="29%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:29.3%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:4.24%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">=</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="66%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:66.46%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">$3,763</font></font></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

 <tr>

  <td width="29%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:29.3%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="4%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:4.24%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="66%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:66.46%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:4.9%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:9.94%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="85%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:85.16%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Performance Versus

  Target</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Plan has significant

upside, as well as downside performance potential.&#160; As note above, the Bonus Multiple is based on EVA improvement of

the Participants&#146; assigned EVA Center(s).&#160;

If the EVA Center achieves its Target EVA, the Participant will achieve

his or her Target Bonus Percentage or 1.0 times his or her Bonus Multiple.&#160; If the EVA Center exceeds its Target EVA,

the Participant will earn a multiple greater then 1.0.&#160; Conversely if the EVA Center falls below its

EVA Target, the Participant will earn a multiple that is less then 1.0.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">EVA performance and

incentive earnings are directly linked; the better the performance of a

Participants&#146; EVA Centers, the more the Participant will earn.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Does this mean that base

pay can be taken away from you?&#160;

No.&#160; It does mean, however, that

it is possible to earn a &#147;negative bonus&#148;.&#160;

A negative bonus will occur if the actual EVA in any year falls

dramatically short of the EVA Target.&#160;

In this case, the negative bonus would be applied to the EVA Bonus Bank,

if applicable.&#160; (See the discussion

below regarding the EVA Bonus Bank.)</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Participants, Grades 1 to

8, including eligible hourly Participants, will not participate in the EVA

Bonus Bank and therefore, will not be subject to a negative bonus.&#160; In exchange, their Bonus Multiple for these

Participants will not exceed 2.0.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:4.9%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:9.98%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="85%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:85.12%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Payment of Bonus and

  EVA Bonus Bank (Grades 9 and Above)</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The amount of any

positive bonus shall be paid in cash (net of withholdings) to the Participant,

subject to a banking system of two thirds of the amount in excess of the annual

EVA Target Bonus.&#160; The total bonus

payment for each Plan year will be determined as follows:</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Beginning

Bank Balance</font></font></b></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">+&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Bonus

Declared</u></font></font></b></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">=&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Available

Bank Balance</font></font></b></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">-&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Bank

Payout to Participant</font></font></b></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:3.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">[Up to Target Bonus <u>plus </u>33

1/3% of any remaining amount in the Bank]</font></font></b></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">=&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Ending

Bank Balance</font></font></b></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The banking system serves

to smooth bonus payouts over the business cycle.&#160; This banking system also ensures that performance is sustained by

making the payout of bank balances contingent on sustained performance, through

the formula outlined above.</font></font></p>



<font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1 -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

</font></font>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">As described above, it is

possible to earn a negative bonus.&#160; As

such, it is also possible for a Participant&#146;s Bonus Bank balance to be

negative.&#160; In the event a Participant&#146;s Bonus

Bank is negative going into a new plan year and during that year a positive EVA

Bonus is declared for a Participant&#146;s EVA Center, 50% of the declared Bonus (to

the extent the Bonus Bank is negative) will be used to reduce the negative

Bonus Bank.&#160; The remaining declared

bonus would be paid to the Participant during the current year.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">For example, lets assume

a Participant has a negative Bonus Bank of $1,000 beginning the year.&#160; During the year, a $1,500 bonus is

declared.&#160; Under these circumstances

$750 would be paid in the current year (50% of the $1,500) and the

Participant&#146;s Bonus Bank would enter the following year with a balance of a

negative $250 (-$1,000 beginning Bonus Bank + $750 or 50% of the current year&#146;s

Declared Bonus).</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The payment will be made

(net of withholding) shortly after the Company&#146;s fourth quarter earnings

release.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Bonus Bank balance,

if any, is not separately funded or set aside like a 401(K) or pension plan and

remains an asset of the Company, subject to the rights of general

creditors.&#160; Further, it is not adjusted

for interest or gains and losses.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:4.9%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">B.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:9.56%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="85%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:85.54%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Administration and

  Guidelines of the Plan</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Finance and Human

Resources Departments will administer the Plan.&#160; Guidelines for EVA adjustments and the &#147;capitalization&#148; of

certain items will be maintained by the Company&#146;s Chief Financial Officer and

may be reviewed upon request.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:4.9%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:9.22%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="85%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:85.88%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Duration of the Current

  Plan Provisions</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">It is anticipated that

the EVA Bonus Plan will endure long into the future. However, the current

provisions in the Plan have been set and will not change, except in the

circumstances noted below, until August 31, 2003.&#160; After that date, the Plan&#146;s provisions will be reviewed and key

factors may be recalibrated.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">A key factor subject to

recalibration is the Company&#146;s <i><font style="font-style:italic;">estimated</font></i> Cost of Capital used in the determination

of the EVA Capital Charge.&#160; After

extensive independent financial analysis we have estimated the Company&#146;s

average Cost of Capital to be 10%.&#160; This

amount will not change through August 31, 2002.&#160; However, beginning in September 2002, the Cost of Capital will be

reviewed annually by the Company&#146;s Chief Financial Officer to verify that the

Cost of Capital being used is a reasonable approximation of the actual cost to

the Company.&#160; The Cost of Capital will only

change if there is a greater than 1 percent increase or decrease in the

estimated Cost of Capital from the prior year.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">In addition, if during

the two fiscal years following the Plan&#146;s adoption, the Company materially

changes in either its form, lines of business or capital structure, the President

of the Company and the Compensation Committee each reserve the right to make

any changes to the EVA Bonus Plan as they deem appropriate.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The President of the

Company and the Compensation Committee each have the right to discontinue the

EVA Bonus Plan at any time after August 31, 2003, upon not less than thirty

days advance notice.</font></font></p>



<font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1 -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

</font></font>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:4.9%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:9.22%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="85%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:85.88%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Individual Awards</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Individual Awards for

Participants shall be based on the Base Salary (as defined above) actually paid

to the Participant during the fiscal year.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Individual Awards for

Shared Service Participants of the Company will be based upon an analysis of

the amount of time the Participant charged to Schnitzer Steel in the prior

fiscal year.&#160; That amount of time will

be rounded to the nearest 25%. In the case of a new Participant, the Individual

Award will be based upon the time charged to Schnitzer Steel during the fiscal

year, again rounded to the nearest 25%.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">For example, Participant

A charged 1,350 hours to Schnitzer Steel in the prior year, which would equate

to 65% (1,350/2,080) of his or her time employed by the Schnitzer Group of

companies.&#160; This amount would be rounded

up to 75%. Since the amount was based upon the prior fiscal year, if that

allocation is not a reasonable indicator of time (greater than 25% variance)

for the then current year, the Individual Award would be adjusted

accordingly.&#160; The remaining potential

bonus if any (in the example above, 25%), would be paid at the sole discretion

of the Office of the President and would be paid when bonuses are paid by the

other Schnitzer Group companies.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:4.9%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:9.06%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:86.04%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Determination of Bonus

  Awards</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Company&#146;s Chief

Financial Officer will compute each EVA Center&#146;s Actual EVA for the applicable

plan year and present it for approval by the President. As soon as reasonably

practical after the Company&#146;s fourth quarter press release, the bonus payments

will be made to the Participants.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:4.9%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:9.06%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:86.04%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">New Hires/Promotions</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">An individual who is

hired/promoted into a position that participates in the Bonus Plan may be

eligible for an Individual Award on a pro-rata basis for that year so long as

he/she has been employed full time for 90 consecutive calendar days.&#160; The pro-rata basis will be determined by the

number of days the Participant holds his or her respective position(s) for the

respective fiscal year.&#160; For example, a

Participant is hired into a bonus eligible position on November 17th.&#160; He or she would be eligible to earn

288/365ths of his or her Target Bonus for the year.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Mid-year promotions that

change the Participant&#146;s Target Bonus and/or EVA Center will be prorated based

upon the number of days employed in each position and/or EVA Center during the

fiscal year.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:4.9%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="8%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:8.66%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:86.46%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Transfers</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">A Participant who

transfers his or her employment from one EVA Center to another shall have his

or her EVA Bonus Bank transferred to the new EVA Center.&#160; For the year including the transfer, the

Participant will have his or her bonus award based on time spent in each

particular EVA Center on a pro-rata basis for the portion of year the

individual was employed by each EVA Center (adjusted by the number of days

employed in the EVA Center during the fiscal year).&#160; The Participant&#146;s pro-rata share will be based on the EVA

Center&#146;s full year EVA performance.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:4.9%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="8%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:8.48%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:86.62%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Death or Disability</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">A Participant who dies or

becomes permanently disabled, as defined by the Company&#146;s disability policy,

while in the employment of Schnitzer Steel shall receive full payment of his or

her Bonus Bank Balance after the impact of a pro-rata bonus (based upon the

number of days employed) for the fiscal year in which he or she dies or becomes

permanently disabled.&#160; In the event of

death, the payment will be made to the Participant&#146;s estate. Such payment shall

be made at the regular time for making bonus payments in respect to the year of

such death or disability.</font></font></p>



<font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1 -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

</font></font>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;">&nbsp;</p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:4.9%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="8%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:8.48%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="86%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:86.62%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Retirement</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">A Participant who retires

from the Company shall receive full payment of his or her Bonus Bank balance

and will be eligible for a pro-rata bonus (based upon the number of days

employed) for the fiscal year in which he or she retires.&#160; Such payment shall be made in a lump sum at

the regular time of making bonus payments. For the purposes of this paragraph

8, a person who is at least age 55 is deemed to be &#147;retired&#148; when he or she

would receive retirement benefits under his or her retirement pension plan, if

any.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="4%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:4.9%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="8%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:8.08%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="87%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:87.04%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Involuntary Termination

  without Cause</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">A Participant who is

involuntarily terminated without cause shall receive full payment of his or her

Bonus Bank balance and will be eligible for a pro-rata bonus (based upon the

number of days employed) for the fiscal year in which he or she was

involuntarily terminated without cause. Such payment shall be made in a lump

sum at the regular time of making bonus payments.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:3.76%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:9.2%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="87%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:87.04%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Voluntary Resignation

  or Termination with Cause</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Voluntary termination of

employment (except in the event of Retirement) or termination with cause

(consistent with Company policy) shall result in forfeiture of the

Participant&#146;s Bonus Bank balance and pro-rata bonus for the year of voluntary

resignation or termination with cause.&#160;&#160;

Further, an employee must still be employed by the Company on the

payment date in order to be paid for the prior year bonus.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">For example: A

Participant was employed for the entire fiscal year ended August 31, 2001 and

his or her EVA Center earned a Bonus Multiple for the year then ended.&#160; However, the Participant terminates his or

her employment on September 30, 2001.&#160;

The bonus payments for fiscal 2001 were paid on October 1, 2001.&#160; In this case, the Participant would forfeit

his or her entire fiscal 2001 bonus and Bonus Bank, if any.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:3.76%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:9.2%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="87%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:87.04%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Negative Bonus Bank

  Balances Upon Termination</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Negative ending Bonus

Bank balances are waived upon a Participant&#146;s termination of employment.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="98%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:98.3%;">

 <tr>

  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:3.74%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:9.26%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="87%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:87.0%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">General Provisions</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

 <tr>

  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:3.74%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:9.26%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="87%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:87.0%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

 </tr>

 <tr>

  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:3.74%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:9.26%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:5.2%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">a)</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="81%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:81.8%;">

  </td>

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

 </tr>

 <tr>

  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:3.74%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">c)</font></font></p>

  </td>

  <td width="81%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;width:81.64%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Other Incentive or

  Benefits</font></font></u></p>

  </td>

 </tr>

<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">POWER OF ATTORNEY</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(Form 10-K)</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="left" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The undersigned hereby constitutes and appoints each

of Robert W. Philip, Kenneth M. Novack, Barry A. Rosen and Kelly Lang his true

and lawful attorney and agent, with full power of substitution and resubstitution,

for him and in his name, place and stead, in any and all capacities, to sign

the Annual Report on Form 10-K of Schnitzer Steel Industries, Inc. for the year

ended August 31, 2001 and any and all amendments thereto, and to file the same,

with all exhibits thereto, and other documents in connection therewith, with

the Securities and Exchange Commission, granting unto each attorney and agent

full power and authority to do any and all acts and things necessary or

advisable to be done, as fully and to all intents and purposes as he might or

could do in person, hereby ratifying and confirming all that the attorney and

agent or his substitute or substitutes, may lawfully do or cause to be done by

virtue hereof.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The undersigned hereby constitutes and appoints each

capacities, to sign the Annual Report on Form 10-K of Schnitzer Steel

Industries, Inc. for the year ended August 31, 2001 and any and all amendments

in connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange Commission, granting

unto each attorney and agent full power and authority to do any and all acts

and things necessary or advisable to be done, as fully and to all intents and

purposes as he might or could do in person, hereby ratifying and confirming all

that the attorney and agent or his substitute or substitutes, may lawfully do

  </td>

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

 </tr>

</table>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

</font></font>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">POWER OF ATTORNEY</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(Form 10-K)</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="left" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The undersigned hereby constitutes and appoints each

of Robert W. Philip, Kenneth M. Novack, Barry A. Rosen and Kelly Lang his true

and lawful attorney and agent, with full power of substitution and

resubstitution, for him and in his name, place and stead, in any and all

capacities, to sign the Annual Report on Form 10-K of Schnitzer Steel

Industries, Inc. for the year ended August 31, 2001 and any and all amendments

thereto, and to file the same, with all exhibits thereto, and other documents

in connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange Commission, granting

unto each attorney and agent full power and authority to do any and all acts

and things necessary or advisable to be done, as fully and to all intents and

purposes as he might or could do in person, hereby ratifying and confirming all

that the attorney and agent or his substitute or substitutes, may lawfully do

or cause to be done by virtue hereof.</font></font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The undersigned hereby constitutes and appoints each

 <tr>

  <td width="45%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt .7pt .7pt;width:45.56%;">

  <p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

  </td>

  </td>

<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">POWER OF ATTORNEY</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(Form 10-K)</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="left" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The undersigned hereby constitutes and appoints each

of Robert W. Philip, Kenneth M. Novack, Barry A. Rosen and Kelly Lang his true

and lawful attorney and agent, with full power of substitution and

resubstitution, for him and in his name, place and stead, in any and all

capacities, to sign the Annual Report on Form 10-K of Schnitzer Steel

Industries, Inc. for the year ended August 31, 2001 and any and all amendments

thereto, and to file the same, with all exhibits thereto, and other documents

in connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange Commission, granting

unto each attorney and agent full power and authority to do any and all acts

and things necessary or advisable to be done, as fully and to all intents and

purposes as he might or could do in person, hereby ratifying and confirming all

that the attorney and agent or his substitute or substitutes, may lawfully do

or cause to be done by virtue hereof.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">POWER OF ATTORNEY</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">(Form 10-K)</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="center" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p align="left" style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The undersigned hereby constitutes and appoints each

of Robert W. Philip, Kenneth M. Novack, Barry A. Rosen and Kelly Lang his true

and lawful attorney and agent, with full power of substitution and

resubstitution, for him and in his name, place and stead, in any and all

capacities, to sign the Annual Report on Form 10-K of Schnitzer Steel

Industries, Inc. for the year ended August 31, 2001 and any and all amendments

thereto, and to file the same, with all exhibits thereto, and other documents

in connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange Commission, granting

unto each attorney and agent full power and authority to do any and all acts

and things necessary or advisable to be done, as fully and to all intents and

purposes as he might or could do in person, hereby ratifying and confirming all

that the attorney and agent or his substitute or substitutes, may lawfully do

or cause to be done by virtue hereof.</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Dated&#160;&#160; November 29, 2001</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>



<p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></font></p>
